name: SkuIdlistbyRefIdlist
description:
Receives a list of Reference IDs and returns a list with the corresponding SKU IDs.

>⚠️ The list of Reference IDs in the request body cannot have repeated Reference IDs, or the API will return an error 500. 

## Request body example

```json
[
    "123",
    "D25133K-B2",
    "14-556",
    "DCF880L2-BR"
]
```

### Response body example

```json
{
    "123": "435",
    "D25133K-B2": "4351",
    "14-556": "3155",
    "DCF880L2-BR": "4500"
}
```

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$block: Object composed by a list of SKU IDs related to each Reference ID list searched. Structure: "{RefId}": "{SkuId}".
